snippet: As the drama over Attorney General Jeff Sessions plays out in Washington, the Kremlin is watching with a mixture of frustration and regret how the uproar is blocking progress on pressing issues on the U.S.-Russian agenda....

headline.main: PETA Condemns N.H.L.’s Use of Real Penguins in Pittsburgh Pregame Show
headline.print_headline: Activists Condemn the Use of Live Penguins

lead_paragraph: As the drama over Attorney General Jeff Sessions plays out in Washington, the Kremlin is watching with a mixture of frustration and regret how the uproar is blocking progress on pressing issues on the U.S.-Russian agenda.
